in st/space indicated yo pull up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice repeat from * 3 more in same st/space 5 loops on hook yo draw through all loops 2dtr-cluster 2 double treble_crochet cluster *yo 3 times insert hook in st/space yo pull up lp yo draw through 2 loops 3 times repeat from * once more in same st/space 3 loops on hook yo draw through all loops 3dtr-cluster 3 double treble_crochet cluster *yo 3 times insert hook in st/space yo pull up lp yo draw through 2 loops 3 times repeat from * twice more in same st/space 4 loops on hook yo draw through all loops 4trtr-cluster 4 treble treble_crochet cluster *yo 4 times insert hook in st/space yo pull up lp yo draw through 2 loops 4 times repeat from * 3 more times in same st/space 5 loops on hook yo draw through all loops puff puff yo insert hook in st/space yo pull up loop 3 times in same st/space 7 loops on hook yo draw through all loops pattern notes double magic_ring i prefer to start all my snowflakes with a double magic_ring this is executed just like a normal magic_ring with the exception of wrapping the yarn twice at the beginning instead of once if you prefer you may use a standard magic_ring i do not recommend replacing the magic_ring with chains as the snowflakes have been designed to have a very tightly closed center and the chains will leave a visible hole stiffening snowflakes these snowflakes have been designed to be firmly stiffened and most will not hang properly without stiffening i have provided instructions at the end of these patterns for how i prefer to stiffen items 3 | page copyright © 2022 by jessica wifall all rights reserved instructions heart love approximately 3 5inches note this snowflake tends to be very rippled when completed it will flatten out when stiffened make a double magic_ring round 1 ch1 does not count as st in magic_ring 1sc ch1 count as first double_crochet * ch12 1dc repeat from * 4 more times ch9 double_crochet in chain of first double_crochet made counts as last 12-chain pull magic ring tight 6 double_crochet 6 12-chain round 2 * 1ss in third chain of next chain-12 space ch9 skip 2 chain 1dc ch9 1dc ch9 skip 2 chain 1ss repeat from * 5 more times 12 double_crochet 18 9-chain round 3 * 5sc 2hdc 5dc 1hdc 1sc in next chain-space 3sc 2hdc 5dc 2hdc 3sc in next chain-space
